title: Stray Souls: Stolen Memories v1.0
description:
Stray Souls: Stolen Memories v1.0
Requirements: 2.3+
Overview: Guide a mother who pursues a terrifying apparition into a twisted reality to save her daughter.

As you explore a strange town in which an evil clown has turned all of the residents into wooden dolls, you'll slowly peel back the layers of a disturbing story that reveals why the mother's husband has never spoken about his past. To uncover the shocking truth, you'll interact with the few remaining inhabitants, search every shadowy corner for clues, and solve highly imaginative puzzles. The clown's ghastly visage will fill each step with dread, even as the mother's love for her daughter propels you forward. Can you reunite this family before the clown claims another soul?
